install_msg: MemberSync installed. Use `[p]help membersync` to see commands.
name: MemberSync
description: Verify Discord users as alliance members using local AllianceScraper DB, with reviewer workflow, auto-prune and retry queue.
end_user_data_statement: Stores minimal link and audit data for verification purposes.
